org.codehaus.mojo.animal_sniffer.logging

Interface Logger

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PrintWriterLogger

    public interface Logger
    Abstracts out logging so that the different logging providers (eg ANT or Maven) can be plugged in.
    Since:
    1.3
    Author:
    connollys
